title: Teaser of the Day:  Under the guise of being an objective “established” observation.
post:
I would say the following…
The appearance of the image on the cloth resembles the characteristics of a photo-negative in some ways and a negative view of the image appears to have photo-positive characteristics in some ways, but color is not one of the resemblances.  
In terms of a photograph of the Shroud, a positive looks similar to a negative and a negative looks similar to a positive.  Both have some characteristics of reverse photos but are obviously not photos.
The coloring of positive and negative views of the Shroud image appear reversed from the normal coloring of a photo if one can overlook the coloration the cloth gives the image.
author: Andy Weiss
